questions.question: How many days have passed when this section starts?
What were the women doing at the beginning of this section?

choices.answer: mournfully bringing their household items to the seashore
looking back to gaze at their dwellings
monitoring their children as they played

questions.question: T or F:  Acadian men were released from church and led to the seashore.
T or F:  The Acadian men abandoned their Catholic faith during this difficult time.
T or F: Evangeline was reunited with both her father and Gabriel.

choices.answer: Animals had no owners to care for them.
Families were kept together on the ships.
The priest walked around consoling the people.
Houses in Grand Pre were burned and destroyed.

questions.question: Which of the following did not happen in this section?

choices.answer: Benedict is given a proper burial.
Acadians left on the shore began to load the ships.
The animals of Grand Pre were disturbed by the fires.

questions.question: Which of the following does not happen in this section?
